mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ S1 /*고객서비스AS설치대상내역, AC211TB*/ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ S2 /*고객서비스수행배정내역, AC221TB*/ ON S2.CST_SV_ASN_NO = S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ S3 /*고객서비스작업결과내역, VS106TB*/ ON S3.CST_SV_ASN_NO = S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND S3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ S6 /*고객서비스수행내역*/ ON S6.CNTR_NO = S1.CNTR_NO AND S6.CNTR_SN = S1.CNTR_SN AND S6.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS C0 /*계약기본*/ ON C0.CNTR_NO = S1.CNTR_NO AND C0.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL C1 /*계약상세*/ ON C1.CNTR_NO = S1.CNTR_NO AND C1.CNTR_SN = S1.CNTR_SN AND C1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_PD_REL C2 /*계약상품관계*/ ON C2.CNTR_NO = S1.CNTR_NO AND C2.CNTR_SN = S1.CNTR_SN AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN C2.VL_STRT_DTM AND C2.VL_END_DTM AND C2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND C2.PD_REL_TP_CD = '05' INNER JOIN T_CMY_USR_M U1 /* 사용자기본 */ ON U1.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND U1.BASE_RLE_CD = 'W8030' AND U1.USR_ID = S1.FST_RGST_USR_ID AND U1.DEL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN T_CMP_USR_ACO_M U2 /* 사용자계정기본 */ ON U2.USR_ID = U1.USR_ID AND U2.DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 /* 출고구분 */ AND S1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD ='1112' AND S2.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20' AND S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = #{cstSvAsnNo} AND S1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND S1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}
